action.name: Script: app = getMapValue(apps, value); global_last_selected_app = app
Script: cleanup
Script: dbot_cmd_prefix = "@bluscream "; author = split(notification_text, "\n")[2]; author = split(author, " ")[0]; notification_text_lower= toLowerCase(notification_text);
Script: dbot_msg_prefix = ":robot: "; device_model = trim(device_model); device_version = trim(device_version); dbot_suffix = "\n\nSent from my {device_model} running Android {device_version}.";
Script: exec_flow = split(title, "Flow ")[1]; exec_flow = split(exec_flow, " ended with an error")[0];
action.script: exec_flow = split(title, "Flow ")[1]; exec_flow = split(exec_flow, " ended with an error")[0];

action.name: Script: frequencies = trim(frequencies); frequencies = split(frequencies, " "); freq = newList(); for (x in frequencies) { x = x / 1000; addElement(freq, x) } freq = replace(freq, "[", ""); freq = replace(freq, "]", ""); freq = replace(freq, " ", ""); //mfreq = "{mfreq, numberformat, #}" / 1000
Script: geometry = split(replace(stdout, "Physical size: ", ""), "x"); x = toNumber(geometry[0]); y = toNumber(geometry[1]); global_screen_short = min(x, y); global_screen_long = max(x, y);
script: get links list

Script: global_force_refresh_apps = false; keys = getMapKeys(global_package_info); apps = newMap(); names = newList(); for (k in keys) { name = getAppName(k); addElement(names, name); addMapEntry(apps, name, k); } sort(names);
Script: governors = trim(governors); governors = split(governors, " "); governors = replace(governors, "[", ""); governors = replace(governors, "]", ""); governors = replace(governors, " ", "");
Script: if(at < length(text)) { ch = substring(text, at, at + 1); at = at + 1; } else { ch = ''; }

Script: if(isEmpty(vshelter)) { vshelter = newList(); } variables = newMap(); for(vn in getMapKeys(local)) { addMapEntry(variables, vn, getValue(vn, null)); setValue(vn, getMapValue(local, vn)); } addElement(vshelter, variables);
Script: local = newMap(); addMapEntry(local, 'object', newMap()); addMapEntry(local, 'key', null);
Script: local = newMap(); addMapEntry(local, 'string', ''); addMapEntry(local, 'uffff', ''); addMapEntry(local, 'i', 0);
Script: local = newMap(); addMapEntry(local, 'value', null); addMapEntry(local, 'length', 0); addMapEntry(local, 'i', 0);
Script: msg = "Mobile Discord Selfbot by Bluscream :joy:"
Script: regex get lyrics from page

Script: text = arg_text; escapee = newMap(); addMapEntry(escapee, '"', '"'); addMapEntry(escapee, '\\', '\\'); addMapEntry(escapee, '/', '/'); addMapEntry(escapee, 'b', 'b'); addMapEntry(escapee, 'f', '\f'); addMapEntry(escapee, 'n', '\n'); addMapEntry(escapee, 'r', '\r'); addMapEntry(escapee, 't', '\t'); at = 0; ch = ' ';
Script: uffff = concat(uffff, ch); i = i + 1;
Script: variables = removeElement(vshelter, length(vshelter) - 1); for(vn in getMapKeys(variables)) { setValue(vn, getMapValue(variables, vn)); }

flow.name: HideWhatsApp
flow.actioncontainer: Benachrichtigung auf Bildschirm: WhatsApp Aktivität verborgen. (lange)
Benachrichtigung auf Bildschirm: WhatsApp Aktivität sichtbar. (lange)

triggercontainer.trigger: UI Event: Window opened package com.imgur.mobile contains text Skip

flow.name: JSON: array
flow.actioncontainer: Execute Flows: JSON: next and white
Execute Flows: JSON: end of scope
Execute Flows: JSON: start of scope
Execute Flows: JSON: next and white
Execute Flows: JSON: next and white
Execute Flows: JSON: end of scope
Execute Flows: JSON: next and white

flow.name: JSON: end of scope
flow.actioncontainer: Script: variables = removeElement(vshelter, length(vshelter) - 1); for(vn in getMapKeys(variables)) { setValue(vn, getMapValue(variables, vn)); }

flow.name: JSON: next
flow.actioncontainer: Script: if(at < length(text)) { ch = substring(text, at, at + 1); at = at + 1; } else { ch = ''; }

flow.name: JSON: number
flow.actioncontainer: Execute Flows: JSON: next and white
Execute Flows: JSON: next and white
Execute Flows: JSON: next and white
Execute Flows: JSON: start of scope
Execute Flows: JSON: end of scope

flow.name: JSON: object
flow.actioncontainer: Execute Flows: JSON: next and white
Execute Flows: JSON: next and white
Execute Flows: JSON: start of scope
Execute Flows: JSON: end of scope
Script: local = newMap(); addMapEntry(local, 'object', newMap()); addMapEntry(local, 'key', null);
Execute Flows: JSON: next and white
Execute Flows: JSON: next and white
Execute Flows: JSON: end of scope
Execute Flows: JSON: next and white

flow.name: JSON: parse
flow.actioncontainer: Script: text = arg_text; escapee = newMap(); addMapEntry(escapee, '"', '"'); addMapEntry(escapee, '\\', '\\'); addMapEntry(escapee, '/', '/'); addMapEntry(escapee, 'b', 'b'); addMapEntry(escapee, 'f', '\f'); addMapEntry(escapee, 'n', '\n'); addMapEntry(escapee, 'r', '\r'); addMapEntry(escapee, 't', '\t'); at = 0; ch = ' ';

flow.name: JSON: start of scope
flow.actioncontainer: Script: if(isEmpty(vshelter)) { vshelter = newList(); } variables = newMap(); for(vn in getMapKeys(local)) { addMapEntry(variables, vn, getValue(vn, null)); setValue(vn, getMapValue(local, vn)); } addElement(vshelter, variables);

flow.name: JSON: string
flow.actioncontainer: Execute Flows: JSON: next and white
Execute Flows: JSON: start of scope
Script: local = newMap(); addMapEntry(local, 'string', ''); addMapEntry(local, 'uffff', ''); addMapEntry(local, 'i', 0);
Map Values: ch using map (a, A => 11 b, B => 12 c, C => ...) store result in hex
Execute Flows: JSON: end of scope
Script: uffff = concat(uffff, ch); i = i + 1;

flow.name: JSON: value
flow.actioncontainer: Map Values: {ch} using map ({=>object [=>array "=>string 0...) store result in mapped_value

flow.name: JSON: word
flow.actioncontainer: Execute Flows: JSON: end of scope
Execute Flows: JSON: start of scope
Script: local = newMap(); addMapEntry(local, 'value', null); addMapEntry(local, 'length', 0); addMapEntry(local, 'i', 0);

flow.name: Manage Adguard
flow.actioncontainer: Input Dialog: Manage Adguard Single Choice 1,Start,3,Stop,5,Exit

flow.name: Mgit auto push
flow.actioncontainer: Notification on Statusbar: Push changes? Notification

flow.name: New activity
flow.actioncontainer: Notification on Statusbar: Current Activity Information
flow.conditioncontainer: Expression: package_whitelist = newList( "ch.gridvision.ppam.androidautomagic", "com.teslacoilsw.launcher", "com.android.launcher3.Launcher" ); activity_whitelist = newList( "com.android.systemui.recents.RecentsActivity", "android.widget.framelayout" ); source_class_name != "" and source_class_name != null and not containsElement(activity_whitelist, source_class_name) and not containsElement(package_whitelist, package_name)

triggercontainer.trigger: UI Event: Window opened package * matches glob *

flow.name: Octodroid Signature
flow.actioncontainer: Show Custom Widget Overlay: Intercept Octodroid message, Octodroid send message (60*120) Center Right
Control UI: click("More options"); sleep(100); click("Execute");
Set Default Input Method: Hacker's Keyboard
Set Default Input Method: Automagic Premium
Init Variable Package Info: com.gh4a into package_info

Control UI: device_model = trim(device_model); device_version = trim(device_version); signature = '

---
Sent from my '+ device_model +' running Android '+ device_version +' via '+ package_info["com.gh4a"]["application_info"]["label"] +' v.'+package_info["com.gh4a"]["version_name"]; /*if (text == null){ text
Hide Custom Widget Overlay: Intercept Octodroid message

Input Dialog: Class name Single-line text

Set Flow State: Enable Windows Recognizer

flow.name: Update Adblocking
flow.actioncontainer: Execute Root Command: mv /storage/emulated/0/Download/hosts /system/etc/hosts as root in /
Execute Root Command: curl -o hosts http://adblock.mahakala.is/ /storage/emulated/0/Download in
Execute Root Command: chmod 644 /system/etc/hosts as root in /
Execute Root Command: mount -o ro,remount -t rootfs /system as root in /
flow.conditioncontainer: Notification on Statusbar Displayed: com.android.providers.downloads Text contains text hosts
flow.actioncontainer: Execute Root Command: cat /proc/mounts as root in /
Execute Root Command: mount -o rw,remount -t rootfs /system as root in /
Notification on Statusbar: AdBlock Updated Labels ID 5
